# Introduction



```{r options, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo       = TRUE,
               message    = TRUE,
               warning    = TRUE,
               eval       = FALSE)
```

```{r load-package}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("mmulvahill/pulsatile")
library(pulsatile)
```

```{r simulate-pulse}
this_pulse <- simulate_pulse()
str(this_pulse)

ggplot(this_pulse$pulse_data, aes(x = time, y = concentration)) +
  geom_path()
```
